page.title: 18My Favourite Toy.
page.content:
My favourite toy is my{motor bike.}I play with it on the drive and on the back lane. Once I went down Chapel Lane. My motor bike is a Yamaha. My Dad changed my small one for a bigger one when I was seven years old. I was five when I first got one. It has three gears and the back brake is a pedal which you press down with your foot to stop. My Dad puts petrol in it from a can out of the car. I can pull wheelies on my bike and make jumps. I play on it at the weekend and when I get home from school.
{(Jonathan,aged 9)}
